text: The North Korea national under-17 football team represents North Korea in youth international football completions such as FIFA U-17 World Cup and the AFC U-16 Championship. They have been to the tournament five times with its best finish being quarter-finalists in 2005. ==Competition Records== ===FIFA U-17 World Cup record=== FIFA U-17 World Cup FIFA U-17 World Cup FIFA
